/usr/bin/mpicxx  -Wall -Wextra -O0 -fsanitize=address -g -fno-omit-frame-pointer -std=c++17 CMakeFiles/test.dir/ch6/fish.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test.dir/ch6/poissonfunctions.cpp.o -o /home/hf/download/pfp_code/c/bin/test   -L/home/hf/software/lib/libmpi.so  -L/home/hf/software/petsc/lib/libpetsc.so  -Wl,-rpath,/home/hf/software/lib/libmpi.so:/home/hf/software/petsc/lib/libpetsc.so:/home/hf/software/petsc/lib -lm /home/hf/software/lib/libmpi.so /home/hf/software/petsc/lib/libpetsc.so
